name: Compass Rose
description:
Compass Rose is an in-development lateral-thinking puzzle game by Pace Smith. 

Testers: Any feedback is hugely appreciated; if you can record your play session, that would be even more helpful, especially if you include audio of your thought process! If you have files to email me, I'm pace@pacesmith.com. Discord works too: Pace#6772

Instructions are in-game.

<3
